subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nate Robinson, the former Knick, had 12 points and 2 assists in Game 4 and was a major reason the Celtics evened their series with the Lakers, 2-2.
snippet: Nate Robinson, the former Knick, had 12 points and 2 assists in Game 4 and was a major reason the Celtics evened their series with the Lakers, 2-2.
